channel.title: erg on erg home
channel.description: Recent content in erg on erg home

item.title: Products
item.description: The primary eg product is an engagement survey developed in partnership with Eagle I.O. The eg team is also working on an package to capture online survey responses. Engagement survey üíÉ The engagement survey has norms representing most major U.S. metropolitan areas as well as four industrial groups. The feedback report includes automatically generated presentation slides. A tutorial on the use of these slides is available here.

item.title: our team
item.description: Deese people: "A legend can conquer entire galaxies...and live on forever and ever." #DarthVader #StarWars pic.twitter.com/hzkahmZDMN — Darth Vader (@_LordOfTheSith) June 5, 2021 John Kulas , Development & Deployment bubba Sven Ole

Phantazee points Top 20 scorers within position (QB, RB, WR only) were taken from 2020 weekly points scored. Phantazee scoring rulez were then applied 1. Smoothed averages by position (top 20 per week): Figure 1: Smoothed loess estimates. Figure 2: Boxplot estimates show variability within groups of top 20s. Individual performances (top 20 per position): {"x":{"visdat":{"3c88384a1932":["function () "

Ethanol-free petrol map The map below contains information from 2411 stations in MN, WI, SD, ND, and IA indicating that they offer ethanol-free gas. The map data was taken from pure-gas.org, but also relies on latitude and longitude estimates generated from physical addresses via the (R Core Team 2021) package tidygeocoder (Cambon et al. 2021) version 1.0.3 as well as geocodio.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Engagement Survey Feedback Presentation Slides (Example/Tutorial)
item.description: background-image: url(https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/be/Sharingan_triple.svg) ??? Image credit: Wikimedia Commons class: inverse, center, middle Get Started Hello World Install the xaringan package from Github: remotes::install_github("yihui/xaringan") ‚Äì You are recommended to use the RStudio IDE, but you do not have to. Create a new R Markdown document from the menu File -> New File -> R Markdown -> From Template -> Ninja Presentation;1 ‚Äì
